content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position(-5.0, 2.5)
- Steam engine at position(0.5, 6.5)
- Connected with pipes between components
- Fueled with coal (varies between 0-20 coal depending on recent refueling)

### Iron Plate Production at Position(18.5, 73.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position(18.5, 73.5) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at position(19.0, 76.0) smelting iron ore into plates
- Inserter at position(19.5, 78.5) to extract iron plates from furnace
- Inserter at position(19.5, 79.5) to move plates to transport belt
- Transport belt at position(19.5, 80.5) for iron plate transport
- Connected to power grid

### Copper Plate Production at Position(-48.5, 82.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position(-48.5, 82.5) mining copper ore
- Stone furnace at position(-48.0, 85.0) smelting copper ore into plates
- Inserter at position(-47.5, 87.5) to extract copper plates from furnace
- Wooden chest at position(-47.5, 89.5) for copper plate storage
- Connected to power grid

### Copper Cable Factory at Position(-42.5, 90.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(-42.5, 90.5) set to produce copper cables
- Inserter at position(-42.5, 88.5) to feed copper plates into assembler
- Inserter at position(-44.5, 90.5) to extract copper cables from left side
- Inserter at position(-40.5, 90.5) to extract copper cables from right side
- Wooden chest at position(-39.5, 90.5) for copper cable storage (contains 112 cables)
- Wooden chest at position(-38.5, 90.5) for additional copper cable storage
- Inserter at position(-39.5, 92.5) to move cables from chest to transport belt
- Inserter at position(-38.5, 92.5) to move cables from chest to transport belt
- Transport belt connecting to electronic circuit factory
- Connected to power grid

### Electronic Circuit Factory System
Consists of two parallel assembling machines:

#### First Circuit Assembler at Position(-37.5, 102.5)
- Assembling machine at position(-37.5, 102.5) set to produce electronic circuits
- Inserter at position(-37.5, 100.5) to feed copper cables from transport belt
- Inserter at position(-39.5, 102.5) to feed iron plates into assembler
- Inserter at position(-40.5, 102.5) to feed iron plates from chest
- Wooden chest at position(-41.5, 102.5) for iron plate storage
- Inserter at position(-37.5, 104.5) to extract electronic circuits
- Wooden chest at position(-37.5, 105.5) for electronic circuit storage (contains 83 circuits)
- Connected to power grid

#### Second Circuit Assembler at Position(-32.5, 102.5)
- Assembling machine at position(-32.5, 102.5) set to produce electronic circuits
- Inserter at position(-32.5, 100.5) to feed copper cables
- Inserter at position(-34.5, 102.5) to feed iron plates from chest
- Wooden chest at position(-35.5, 103.5) for iron plate storage
- Inserter at position(-32.5, 104.5) to extract electronic circuits
- Wooden chest at position(-32.5, 105.5) for electronic circuit storage (contains 82 circuits)
- Connected to power grid

The factory is now successfully producing electronic circuits, with 165 circuits produced and stored in the output chests (83 in the first chest and 82 in the second chest). The factory is exceeding the target throughput of
